message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a special price. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. My initial offer is $18000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I understand you're looking to negotiate, but I have to consider my costs and the value I'm looking to get from the sale. My next offer is $16500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
I'm still not willing to go below $17000. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make a decent profit. My next offer is $17000, and I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal.
I appreciate the extras you're offering, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $15500?

I'm starting to think we're not on the same page, Bob. I've already compromised a lot, and I'm not willing to go below $18000. My next offer is $18000, and this is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
